content: So they’ll cry and stomp their little white male feet until they get their apology. I am so glad she did not give them one. Republicans are truly shameless, not to mention misogynistic and racist. Too bad someone did not have a key to lock them in their little playroom until the term ends. I do not know what it is going to take to change this dynamic. Perhaps all the lazy, don’t-give-a-crap voters might grow up and start getting involved in their government?
